body:
> God's day will arrive regardless.

But you don't believe in it, so why are you telling it to me?

> Can you even define what a son is or decide if Jesus is God's son or God #2? Of course you can't.

There's where we disagree. You think "son" necessarily means son in the strictest, most literal sense of the term. However, we can't comprehend what this type of son is describing and that's why it is not told. Clearly, it can't be the exact same type of son you're thinking of, because biologically He is Mary's son.

Here is an image of the earliest extant manuscript of John 1, which declares "the word WAS God", and that this word was "manifest in the flesh and dwelled among us": https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/5/58/Papyrus_66_%28GA%29.jpg

It was probably written by John or someone very close to him, unlikely to be Paul and if it was Peter he obviously got along with John, so your argument that Peter and Paul are frauds doesn't dismiss the evidence this time, unless of course you think John is an apostate too.

He's describe as "the light" and the creator as well. I think that's pretty clear.

You are full of pride and love to mock those who disagree with you. You don't sound like you follow Jesus. You sound more like one of the stuck up Pharisees, who were ultimately the main culprits behind His crucifixion.

God's day will arrive regardless.

But you don't believe in it, so why are you telling it to me?

However, we can't comprehend what this type of son is describing and that's why it is not told. Clearly, it can't be the exact same type of son you're thinking of, because biologically He is Mary's son.

Here is an image of the earliest extant manuscript of John 1, which declares "the word WAS God", and that this word was "manifest in the flesh and dwelled among us": https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/5/58/Papyrus_66_%28GA%29.jpg

It was probably written by John or someone very close to him, unlikely to be Paul and if it was Peter he obviously got along with John, so your argument that Peter and Paul are frauds doesn't dismiss the evidence this time, unless of course you think John is an apostate too.

He's describe as "the light" and the creator as well. I think that's pretty clear.

You are full of pride and love to mock those who disagree with you. You don't sound like you follow Jesus. You sound more like one of the stuck up Pharisees, who were ultimately the main culprits behind His crucifixion.

I wish the best for you. Your goals are more reasonable for the average person and I have little doubt you'll obtain them. However you sound like you've already given up, and you're *not* going to get those things by doing that. Go back to existing and living life, just with a more mature mindset.

As for me, I want to do things that only "those" types of people who are higher being and have few faults are able to accomplish. That is every single person I am friends with. They can do things, but I cannot and that will probably never change. The only solution I can see is to somehow change all my passions, which isn't exactly simple.

Also, find me on Discord if you want to talk further. I'm often not online but I should be easy to find in the ruqqus server, I have the same username.

post.body: I HAVE FUCKING HAD IT! NOT **ONE** OTHER PERSON HERE HAS A SINGLE FAULT EXCEPT FOR ME! I can't do anything right. Even the smallest things I try to do fall apart immediately, and everyone else just keeps moving along achieving pretty much anything they want if they set their mind to it. Sure, they fail some, but at least not all the time! And I've had it with everyone trying to sugarcoat it and make it seem like it's not a big deal, because it is. Whenever there's any kind of group project or organization, guess who's the only one not invited every single time? You guessed it, it's me! And they're not bullying me, it's because they know at a subconscious level that I'm not worth the dust beneath my paws, even the ones who have tried to deny this know it, and their actions prove it. Stop lying to me, the evidence is right in front of all of us! Not one thing I attempt ever finishes, and even if it would it'd be a huge mess and so much less than everyone else can do in a fraction of the time and effort. Now you may say, "Oh, I couldn't do what you did!". But you've never tried or been interested have you? Exactly. I don't and can't do even *one thing* halfway decently. Don't give me that 10000 hours crap or whatever, it hasn't worked at all for me and no one else even needs it. It's a myth, and even science has proven that, along with common sense. Practice accounts for maybe 0.1-10% of the difference, the rest is just innate intelligence that you have to be born with, not a fucking thing you can do about it. And everyone here has that in every field except me! I don't even know *one* other person who has this problem, I'm completely alone. Here everyone else is doing all sorts of crazy things and I can't even find a fox picture on the internet after searching for 2 hours with years of experience. I'm always out of the loop, super dull, can barely even think. I do a few things somewhat well but I'm faking it. They consist of a few specific things I've seen other people do and copying it robotically, with literally no understanding. I literally can't do *anything* else. Everyone else can at least do the thing they've been doing all the time for years, usually more than that, but me, nope, not even mediocre at one fucking thing! Not one hobby, not one game, not one subject, nothing! I'm uncharismatic, dull, forgetful, and just utterly incompetent! I'm a born loser, a wannabe in every way, and I just don't know how to play these cards! I get nothing but frustration and failure. This is so fucking unfair! The only thing I'm good at is burdening people with my problems. I used to have a some creativity at least when I was young but of course that went away as I got older and went through puberty and I can't ever even have that back! Damnit, what am I ever going to do with this situation! If I only knew even one other person on the whole planet who could sympathize with me. But no, you're all perfect and flawless and have superpowers compared to me, in real life and online. I need to give up on everything, my every effort is 100% in vain. But I'm not a passive consumer, and I can't just do that! Why am I like that when I don't have what it takes? I have no peace with myself, I can't just accept it, I don't want to waste my whole life in this miserable state. Someone please help me, I am falling apart! And please don't try to feed me more sugarcoated politically correct nonsense, that is not helping! Please, is there anything I can do escape this frustration and have joy in life?

And they're not bullying me, it's because they know at a subconscious level that I'm not worth the dust beneath my paws, even the ones who have tried to deny this know it, and their actions prove it. Stop lying to me, the evidence is right in front of all of us! Not one thing I attempt ever finishes, and even if it would it'd be a huge mess and so much less than everyone else can do in a fraction of the time and effort. Now you may say, "Oh, I couldn't do what you did!". But you've never tried or been interested have you? Exactly. I don't and can't do even one thing halfway decently. Don't give me that 10000 hours crap or whatever, it hasn't worked at all for me and no one else even needs it. It's a myth, and even science has proven that, along with common sense. Practice accounts for maybe 0.1-10% of the difference, the rest is just innate intelligence that you have to be born with, not a fucking thing you can do about it. And everyone here has that in every field except me! I don't even know one other person who has this problem, I'm completely alone. Here everyone else is doing all sorts of crazy things and I can't even find a fox picture on the internet after searching for 2 hours with years of experience. I'm always out of the loop, super dull, can barely even think. I do a few things somewhat well but I'm faking it. They consist of a few specific things I've seen other people do and copying it robotically, with literally no understanding. I literally can't do anything else. Everyone else can at least do the thing they've been doing all the time for years, usually more than that, but me, nope, not even mediocre at one fucking thing! Not one hobby, not one game, not one subject, nothing! I'm uncharismatic, dull, forgetful, and just utterly incompetent! I'm a born loser, a wannabe in every way, and I just don't know how to play these cards! I get nothing but frustration and failure. This is so fucking unfair! The only thing I'm good at is burdening people with my problems. I used to have a some creativity at least when I was young but of course that went away as I got older and went through puberty and I can't ever even have that back! Damnit, what am I ever going to do with this situation! If I only knew even one other person on the whole planet who could sympathize with me. But no, you're all perfect and flawless and have superpowers compared to me, in real life and online. I need to give up on everything, my every effort is 100% in vain. But I'm not a passive consumer, and I can't just do that! Why am I like that when I don't have what it takes? I have no peace with myself, I can't just accept it, I don't want to waste my whole life in this miserable state. Someone please help me, I am falling apart! And please don't try to feed me more sugarcoated politically correct nonsense, that is not helping! Please, is there anything I can do escape this frustration and have joy in life?

body:
> The Ebionites appear to have understood Jesus not as the Messiah but as a prophetic precursor who heralds the coming kingdom of God on Earth in which two human Messiahs (a Davidic king and an Aaronite high priest) and/or an angelic Messiah (a cosmic judge of the Earth from heaven known as the "Son of man") will reign forever. Consequently, Jesus is believed to have come to fulfill a threefold mission: 1) teach all Israelites to live immediately according to a radical ethic of inward and outward righteousness that will be standard in the Messianic Age; 2) complete the work of Moses by calling for the abolishment of animal sacrifices during a cleansing of the Temple; and 3) die as a moral exemplar (rather than as a substitutionary atonement) to move Israelites to the repentance necessary for personal atonement and national redemption in order to prepare for the world to come.

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ebionites#On_Jesus_the_Nazarene

> And they were right about Paul.

What about Paul and Peter is apostate? Are you suggesting that because they made mistakes, they're damned without mercy? By that logic every single person is apostate with no hope at all. And I suppose that must include James, who supported Paul.

> And if any version of Matthew is edited it's the canonical Greek version.

You have absolutely no evidence for that claim. We have many very old copies of the gospels, and they almost all show amazingly little variation. All text types agree with our version of Matthew, not the Ebionites. The Ebionites' version was clearly the outlier here.

I don't think me noticing myself never even coming close to doing something right while others succeed all the time with much less time and effort is just catastrophizing. It's clear that others can see it too. All I can be good for is ruining everything.

body:
So how did Constantine convert to a religion that didn't exist? What really happened is he was one of the main Roman infiltrators that corrupted it for political purposes, because they knew it was growing and they couldn't just persecute it like they had been doing.

And by the way, there are fragments of the new testament found as early as the first half of the second century, 200 years before when you seem to think it was invented. And those are a tiny few fragments, meaning they most likely go back even earlier too. It's hard to deny that it originated in the first century based on actual events.

parent.body: No, only lying, ignorant Evangeliclowns would. And they'd be wrong and lying, like they always are. The most formative period of Christianity started with Constantine's alleged conversation at the Battle of the Milvian Bridge 312 AD, followed by the Edict of Milan 313 AD, then the start of state endorsed ecumenism with the First Council of Nicea 325 AD. Which would later culminate with the Edict of Thessalonica 380 AD co-authored by emperor Theodosius, followed by the First Council of Constantinople 381 AD, finalizing the satanic doctrine of the trinity abomination, and making Christianity and the Nicene orthodoxy of Rome and Alexandria mandatory state religion.

body: It's fake because I can mimick a specific exact process from someone who's actually good at something, but I could never come up with it on my own, which if I want to build my own things is necessary. For example I can score very high in math because I copy exactly how someone else does the problems. But if I wanted to be a mathematician where I actually have to figure things out and think outside the box even a little, it's game over. Then I could learn from others who actually are good how to solve something, and I could then be able to solve those exact type of problems, but never do it myself like they can, which is an essential skill to be able to actually do things on your own. A silly example, but one I figure most people can understand. So I'm actually really stupid and bad at everything, I just tend to systematically copy what the actually smart people do so it *looks* like I'm smarter than I am, but it wasn't really me who did any of the thinking or the work behind it.

Not one hobby, not one game, not one subject, nothing! I'm uncharismatic, dull, forgetful, and just utterly incompetent! I'm a born loser, a wannabe in every way, and I just don't know how to play these cards! I get nothing but frustration and failure. This is so fucking unfair! The only thing I'm good at is burdening people with my problems. I used to have a some creativity at least when I was young but of course that went away as I got older and went through puberty and I can't ever even have that back! Damnit, what am I ever going to do with this situation! If I only knew even one other person on the whole planet who could sympathize with me. But no, you're all perfect and flawless and have superpowers compared to me, in real life and online. I need to give up on everything, my every effort is 100% in vain. But I'm not a passive consumer, and I can't just do that! Why am I like that when I don't have what it takes? I have no peace with myself, I can't just accept it, I don't want to waste my whole life in this miserable state. Someone please help me, I am falling apart! And please don't try to feed me more sugarcoated politically correct nonsense, that is not helping! Please, is there anything I can do escape this frustration and have joy in life?

post.body: I HAVE FUCKING HAD IT! NOT **ONE** OTHER PERSON HERE HAS A SINGLE FAULT EXCEPT FOR ME! I can't do anything right. Even the smallest things I try to do fall apart immediately, and everyone else just keeps moving along achieving pretty much anything they want if they set their mind to it. Sure, they fail some, but at least not all the time! And I've had it with everyone trying to sugarcoat it and make it seem like it's not a big deal, because it is. Whenever there's any kind of group project or organization, guess who's the only one not invited every single time? You guessed it, it's me! And they're not bullying me, it's because they know at a subconscious level that I'm not worth the dust beneath my paws, even the ones who have tried to deny this know it, and their actions prove it. Stop lying to me, the evidence is right in front of all of us! Not one thing I attempt ever finishes, and even if it would it'd be a huge mess and so much less than everyone else can do in a fraction of the time and effort. Now you may say, "Oh, I couldn't do what you did!". But you've never tried or been interested have you? Exactly. I don't and can't do even *one thing* halfway decently. Don't give me that 10000 hours crap or whatever, it hasn't worked at all for me and no one else even needs it. It's a myth, and even science has proven that, along with common sense. Practice accounts for maybe 0.1-10% of the difference, the rest is just innate intelligence that you have to be born with, not a fucking thing you can do about it. And everyone here has that in every field except me! I don't even know *one* other person who has this problem, I'm completely alone. Here everyone else is doing all sorts of crazy things and I can't even find a fox picture on the internet after searching for 2 hours with years of experience. I'm always out of the loop, super dull, can barely even think. I do a few things somewhat well but I'm faking it. They consist of a few specific things I've seen other people do and copying it robotically, with literally no understanding. I literally can't do *anything* else. Everyone else can at least do the thing they've been doing all the time for years, usually more than that, but me, nope, not even mediocre at one fucking thing! Not one hobby, not one game, not one subject, nothing! I'm uncharismatic, dull, forgetful, and just utterly incompetent! I'm a born loser, a wannabe in every way, and I just don't know how to play these cards! I get nothing but frustration and failure. This is so fucking unfair! The only thing I'm good at is burdening people with my problems. I used to have a some creativity at least when I was young but of course that went away as I got older and went through puberty and I can't ever even have that back! Damnit, what am I ever going to do with this situation! If I only knew even one other person on the whole planet who could sympathize with me. But no, you're all perfect and flawless and have superpowers compared to me, in real life and online. I need to give up on everything, my every effort is 100% in vain. But I'm not a passive consumer, and I can't just do that! Why am I like that when I don't have what it takes? I have no peace with myself, I can't just accept it, I don't want to waste my whole life in this miserable state. Someone please help me, I am falling apart! And please don't try to feed me more sugarcoated politically correct nonsense, that is not helping! Please, is there anything I can do escape this frustration and have joy in life?

body:
I'm not exactly an outcast but everyone I know is worth infinitely more than me. They're all at the very top leading everything and people all listening to them and I've always been a nobody who no one takes seriously. Even people I know keep me out of more "important" things because I'm not worthy of it. So I can still relate to that.

But don't cut anyone off anymore. I have a friend who did that and he's even more miserable now, and he's just blank and doesn't exist. Before, he could still savor the good he had in life, but now he gave all that up and only suffers the bad things. You may not have as much of an abundance of luck and success as everyone else, but don't waste what you do have. And please don't abandon your friends, that's just selfish. If you can't stand to be around them at least call them or text them where you can be isolated from whatever amazing things they're doing.

If you can't stand to be around them at least call them or text them where you can be isolated from whatever amazing things they're doing.

parent.body: I'm probably still below average then because I don't really do anything, and when I do it's not as great. Remember when I said I'm undeserving of things others have? Well having friends and all that is too late for me. Several years ago I cut everyone off and I made no effort to befriend anyone, I never learned to communicate properly and I have a bland life, so trying to force anyone to talk to me would be extremely selfish. I even got ran out of one discord server for not having a job because of how socially unacceptable that is. I only have online friends who despite me a horrible person, they still want to talk to me anyway. But I have noticed they're all social rejects as well, a common theme among them most people think they're awful people. Like me. And since I don't have a job I can't buy things for myself, all I have is to sit around and stare at my screen as a way escape my reality. But that's much more difficult compared to a year ago, as internet is now heavily tied to real life it seems.

body: It's not a mind virus. I once thought the same as you, but after making no progress for years I realized it just wasn't realistic. It really is impossible for me to accomplish many of the things the more talented people are doing. It's not what anyone wants to hear, but it's reality, people are *not* equal and life isn't fair. However, don't change your attitude, because you might have a shot at whatever it is you want to do, and your confidence is a good thing in case you are capable. Unfortunately for me, it has been shown that I am not.
